llm_res.rule: Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. 'HIX'.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
The ERC20 standard suggests that to prevent race conditions, clients should first set the allowance to zero before setting it to another value for the same spender.
llm_res.function: `approve` function does not implement best practices for handling allowances.
